text:
On Enoshima Beach, basking in strong sunlight,
a voice called out to [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's good to know!
It took me a little while to put on my swimsuit...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]-san, have you already taken a walk around Enoshima Beach?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I heard that they're selling local ice cream at the concession stand over there!
Why don't we eat it together!?

options.text: The loose swimsuit suits you too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe!
I'm happy to be praised by you, [Player]-san!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text: They told me to get a loose swimsuit so I could move easily in the water!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text: If it were a tight swimsuit, and my fur were to absorb water and swelled, it would be hard to take off...!

options.text: You're fluffy and cute today too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
R-Really!?
[Player]-san, if you really meant that, I'd feel a bit embarrassed...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text: Especially in summer, when my fur is thick, heat tends to build up, so there are tough days for me...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So, [Player]-san!
It's really hot today, so let's go into the sea quickly and cool off!

name: Yohack
text:
That's... Saotome-san's
specialty sun oil, right?
And you're going to apply it—

name: Yohack
text:
Since I have a lot of fur,
it'll be quite a task,
so are you really sure?

name: Yohack
text:
The sun is stronger than I thought,
so I was worried my fur'd get messy!

name: Yohack
text:
Ah, just a moment!
I'll take off my jacket!

name: Yohack
text:
Well then,
I'll take you up on your offer,
if you could help me with it!

name: Yohack
text:
It smells really good!
My whole body really feels
fluffy and comfortable...!

name: Yohack
text:
Ahahahaha!
It tickles when you rub my belly!

name: Yohack
text:
Ehehe...
Being with [Player]-san like this,
it makes me feel excited...!

[Player] and Yohack enjoyed
their intimate time together.

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san, thanks to you
applying it so carefully,
it felt really good!

name: Yohack
text:
It's hard for me to apply it myself,
so you've helped me a lot!

name: Yohack
text:
It might sound strange to say "in return",
but [Player]-san, I can be your inner tube!

name: Yohack
text:
Since we have come all the way to the sea,
let's make lots of memories!
